subject: Board deck finalized — thanks for the numbers
body: Alex, thanks for getting the product metrics in on time. The board deck is finalized and sent. Good numbers on NPS this quarter. — Elena

subject: Retro prep — want your honest assessment
body: Alex, before the retro I want your honest take: did we actually hit the sprint goal? The auth migration was supposed to be the headline deliverable and David is going to ask. Also want to discuss the incident response — Marcus was solo and that's not sustainable. See you at 4:30. — Sarah

subject: Sprint retro — my notes
body:
Alex, my retro notes:

What went well: rate limiting shipped cleanly, error messages done, incident was resolved quickly.

What didn't: Redis provisioning delay blocked auth testing for 3 days. I lost 6-8 hours to the production incident (unplanned). Sprint goal (auth migration) is NOT met — session management is in review but not fully validated.

Action items I'd propose: (1) on-call rotation so one person doesn't absorb all incident work, (2) infrastructure decisions need faster turnaround, (3) better sprint planning buffer for unplanned work.

— Marcus
